**Title:** *The Supreme Cavern-Divine Transmission Ritual of the Three Sovereigns*
Author unknown, approximately dating to the Northern and Southern Dynasties. Describes the ritual protocols for transmitting the *Cavern-Divine Scripture of the Three Sovereigns*. Originally part of the same text as *The Ritual of the Supreme Cavern-Divine Three Sovereigns*, later separated into an independent work. One scroll.
Source edition: *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Orthodox Section, Part One.

**Disciples of the Supreme August’s Cavernous Divine Three Sovereigns’ Inner Radiance, your servant [Name] and others:**
The Cavernous Divine dharma resides at the inception of the Three Caverns. The dharma master, roaming afar, wears a crown, a yellow skirt, and a mantle with thirty-two strips. At the left side hangs the Great One’s Three Primordials Sword, three feet in length. At the right side hangs a white jade girdle, holding a tricolored (green, yellow, white) staff.

Next, the master proclaims the dharma rank with great gratitude:

**Disciple of the Upper Clarity Mysterious Capital Three Caverns, Supreme August Supreme Great One Lord, Heavenly Master under the Great One Primordial Lord, Supervisor of the Grand Metropolitan Inspector, Yellow-Red Perfected One of the Three Ones, Venerable One, Boundless Great One *Vajra* Golden Portal Emperor Lord, Three Caverns Dharma Master, Jade Clarity Left Supervisor of the Numinous Grand Master, [Peak] Mountain Master, Lesser Manifestation Perfected One, your servant [Name], bows twice and respectfully addresses the Supreme August Supreme August Heavenly Thearch, Boundless Supreme August Primordial Lord, Great One Primordial Lord Grand Supervisor, Ghost Inspector Perfected One, Heavenly Emperor Great King, Nine Heavens Primordial Cavernous Boundless Great Emperor Lord, Great Emperor Venerable One, Jade Cavern Nine Mysterious Cavernous Perfected Cavernous Mysterious Numinous Treasure Three Sovereigns, Cavernous Divine Cavernous Spring Perfected Lords, Supreme Ultimate Lofty Numinous Supreme Thearch Perfected One, Altar-Supervising Mighty Numinous Great Spirits, Great Cavernous Venerable Spirits, Primordial Lord, Upper Clarity Golden Portal Posterior Sage Emperor Lord, Thirty-Six Divisions of Treasure Scriptures and Talismanic Charts Perfected Lords, Perfected Venerable One, Supreme August Wangchen Void August Great Dao Lord, and the Boundless Responsive and Attuned Perfected Ones of the Ten Directions.**

Your servant, amidst the nine lands, is but a speck of dust, a trifling being. Born in an age of Dao transformation and the flourishing of the true dharma, selected among the seed people to propagate its essential teachings, I have been privileged to partake in the rites of transmission, to glimpse the treasure texts, and to receive the deliverance of numinous officials, generals, officers, and soldiers. Externally, this serves to aid the state, rescue the distressed, and succor the people; internally, it serves to establish merit, protect the spirit, and guard life. The grace bestowed is profound, the favor weighty—beyond what worms and ants can repay.

Yet I fear that, since time immemorial, the transgressions of my dark ancestors have accumulated, their faults and errors amassed, and remain unforgiven. My own flaws and blemishes, too, remain unresolved. How could I dare overstep the heavenly statutes and transmit or propagate this teaching? Only by invoking the ancient covenant of the Primordial Mystery, where the five and eight numbers are fulfilled, does the dharma rightfully flow forth. Now, [Name] and others, having purified body and mind, taken refuge in the Great Dao, and presented our vows in sincerity, do solemnly swear before the divine numina. We humbly request to receive the Three Sovereigns’ Treasure Texts and the Cavernous Divine Great Dharma.

Having examined the words and weighed the intent, it is difficult to refuse or deny. Thus, we now present the revealed text before the altar, praying for a response to confirm its efficacy, that human and divine may commune in harmony, as if in accord with heavenly statutes. On such-and-such a day, we shall ascend the altar to complete the transmission and conferral.

I, [Name], have truly pursued the Dao of my own volition, yearning for longevity and transcendence—not coerced by others nor compelled against my will. May all transgressions and evils I and my kin have committed from the past until now be graciously pardoned and swept away, that I may reform myself and begin anew from this day forward.

I humbly dispatch the Yuan Shi Gong Cao and Fei Yun Shi Zhe to bear this covenant document and proclaim its bestowal. With reverence, I present this petition before Your August Majesty—the Most High, Lofty, and Numinous, the Ten Thousand Saints’ Most Revered, the August Heavenly Supreme Emperor, the Supreme Jade Thearch. May You take pity on my entreaty, grant what I have offered, and permit me to receive and bear this teaching.

I specially beseech that You command the Five Directional Emperors, each to lead three thousand jade boys and jade maidens, to attend the sacred scriptures and protect my person. Further, may You decree the Lords of the Nine Yi, Eight Man, Six Rong, Five Di, and Three Qin, each to lead their respective hosts, to purify the dharma altar, where I shall fast and offer obeisance.

May I ever emulate the sagely Sovereigns of the Three August Ones, their gaze ever watchful, that my cultivation may attain completion, my merits and deeds become radiant and full. May the celestial officials and numinous immortals promote my virtues and elevate my goodness. May the seven generations of my ancestors ascend to the heavenly halls, and may the accumulated transgressions of past ages be cleansed this day. May I command spirits and ghosts, subdue malevolent demons, become a teacher to heaven and humanity, benefit the people, and aid the state. When my merits are fulfilled, may I be ranked among the immortal grades.

Should I violate this covenant, break my oath, slight my teachers, or disdain the dharma; should my cultivation be careless, harming my celestial authenticity—then may I submit to the Three Officials and endure eternal punishment. If I observe these precepts with reverence and diligence, may the Three Treasures bestow their protection, the statutes and admonitions bear witness. When the appointed term is complete, may I transmit this teaching to the worthy and faithful, perpetuating the great transformation, upholding and sustaining the teachings’ rites. May the myriad numina of heaven and earth witness this solemn vow.

We, your servants, are overwhelmed with earnest devotion and utmost repentance. With reverence, we submit this petition.

Rising, each performs three bows.

Next, take the ritual sash and tie it outside the robe, with the sun emblem at the front and the moon emblem at the rear, knotting it below the heart. Serene and empty, the Chamber of Celestial Feasts.
The Dark and Mysterious sings the Yang hymn,
The Great Radiance parts the clouds to emerge.

Ever chanting the praises of the Supreme One.

**Second Tablet:** Petition the Earthly August Lord.
**Third Tablet:** Petition the Human August Lord.

Next, the master guides the disciples through the Four Gates to resolve calamities, descending to the southwest Moon Gate beneath the central altar.
The master says: *"Disciples of the Cavernous Divine’s Inner Radiance of the Three Augusts, [Name] and others, pay homage to the Supreme Yin Moon Lord."*
Bow twice.
The master says: *"The August Lord commands that disciples [Name] and others pass through the calamity of the Supreme Yin’s water disaster."*
The disciples bow again.
Next, proceed to the northeast Human Gate.

The master says: *"Disciples of the Cavernous Divine’s Inner Radiance of the Three Augusts, [Name] and others, pay homage to the Supreme Yang Sun Lord."*
The disciples bow twice.
The master says: *"The August Lord commands that disciples [Name] and others pass through the calamities of the Sun Gate—mountain forests, penal prisons, tigers, wolves, and venomous creatures."*
The disciples bow again.

The master says: *"Disciples of the Cavernous Divine’s Inner Radiance of the Three Augusts, [Name] and others, pay homage to the Celestial Gate Lord."*
The disciples bow twice.
The master says: *"The August Lord commands that disciples [Name] and others pass through the calamities of the Celestial Gate—blades, weapons, executions, and slaughter."*
The disciples bow again.

Calamities are transcended, and the attainment of divine transcendence is secured, to behold the Lord of the Purple Court of the Great One and ultimately merge with the formless, uniting with the Dao in truth.

Next, the master leads the disciples in praise to the Mystic Master, dispersing as in the usual rites.
If performing the Offering of Registers, proceed to the Offering before the Twelve Vows; or if the Offering was completed the previous morning, next present the memorial to report merits.

The *Transmission Rites of the Supreme Cavernous Divine Three Augusts* concludes.
